dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: The story of a happy Christmas at her daughters house in Vermont anticipating her grandson Eric's return from the war in Vietnam. Remembers a dear friend who died and recommends a book on St. Augustine by Fr. Hugo. Keywords: fasting, mystical body, work.
